  • Uses of Action in game.actions

    Subclasses of Action in game.actions
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    class 
    BlinkAction
    A BlinkAction class that enables player to blink to a random steps away
    class 
    ConsumeAction
    A class that Player uses to consume consumable magical items (e.g Power Star & SuperMushroom)
    class 
    DestroyAction
    DestroyAction used to destroy Koopa's shell when Koopa is in dormant state.
    class 
    FireAttackAction
     
    class 
    HealAction
    A HealAction class that performs healing to a target
    class 
    JumpAction
    A class that enables a player to attempt to jump to a High Ground
    class 
    ObtainBottleAction
    An ObtainBottleAction class to obtain bottle from Toad
    class 
    PickUpCoinAction
    A PickUpCoinAction class which enables the player to pick up a coin
    class 
    RefillAction
    A RefillAction class to refill water
    class 
    RescueAction
     
    class 
    ResetAction
    A ResetAction class that enables the game to be reset only once
    class 
    SpeakAction
    A SpeakAction class where the Toad will speak one sentence at a time randomly
    class 
    SuicideAction
    A SuicideAction class indicating possibility of the actor being killed during reset or commit suicide in each turn
    class 
    TeleportAction
    A class that enables a player to teleport to a Warp Pipe in the Lava Zone
    class 
    TradeAction
    A TradeAction class is responsible for the trading process between the player and the toad
